scripts.start-windows: cd client & npx tangerine-preview | npx webpack ./index.js --no-optimization-minimize -d source-map -w --output-filename custom-scripts.js -o ./
scripts.start: cd client; trap 'kill %1' SIGINT; ../node_modules/.bin/tangerine-preview & ../node_modules/.bin/webpack ./index.js --no-optimization-minimize -d source-map -w --output-filename custom-scripts.js -o ./
